alert.note: Alert for Bosque; Somervell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 12:43PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Somervell and northwestern Bosque Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1242 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glen Rose, or 16 miles south of Granbury. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glen Rose, Dinosaur Valley State Park and Walnut Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
